Class UnionAcceptancePolicy

All Implemented Interfaces:
MigAcceptancePolicy, Configurable
public class UnionAcceptancePolicy
extends BinaryAcceptancePolicy

This class is a binary acceptance policy. It represents the union of its left and right components. See BinaryAcceptancePolicy for details.

Since:
1.0
